tasks.title: Build login page UI
tasks.description: Create responsive login screen with email/password fields and 'Forgot password' link.

tasks.title: Implement login API integration
tasks.description: Call /api/auth/login and store JWT in secure storage. Handle invalid credentials.

tasks.title: Add form validation to login
tasks.description: Show inline errors for empty email, invalid email format, and short password.

tasks.title: Design dashboard header
tasks.description: Add top navigation bar with logo, search input, and user avatar menu.

tasks.title: Fix navbar flicker on refresh
tasks.description: On hard reload, navbar flashes unstyled for ~200ms. Investigate hydration mismatch.

tasks.title: Task card component
tasks.description: Create reusable <TaskCard /> with title, description, edit and delete actions.

tasks.title: Make board columns scrollable
tasks.description: Each kanban column should scroll independently with max-height instead of full page scroll.

tasks.title: Search tasks by keyword
tasks.description: Add server-side filtering: /api/tasks?q=keyword should match title or description.

tasks.title: Add loading spinner
tasks.description: Show loader overlay while fetching tasks on first load and during search.

tasks.title: Add empty state for columns
tasks.description: If a column has no tasks, show a placeholder message like 'No tasks yet'.

tasks.title: Drag & drop between columns
tasks.description: Allow moving a task from Backlog → In Progress → Review → Done. Update column in backend.

tasks.title: Bug: drag handle not working on mobile
tasks.description: On touch devices the card is not draggable. Investigate pointer vs mouse events.

tasks.title: Add 'Add Task' modal
tasks.description: Modal with title/description inputs, default column='backlog', Save/Cancel actions.

tasks.title: Hook: useKanbanBoard
tasks.description: Extract kanban logic (search, pagination, drag/drop, modal) into custom hook.

tasks.title: Split KanbanColumn component
tasks.description: Move column header, list, and 'Load More' button into a reusable KanbanColumn component.

tasks.title: Add 'Load More' button per column
tasks.description: Initially show 10 tasks per column, then reveal 10 more when user clicks load more.

tasks.title: Persist createdAt for tasks
tasks.description: When creating a new task, generate createdAt timestamp so newest tasks show first.

tasks.title: Sort tasks by createdAt DESC
tasks.description: In GET /api/tasks, sort tasks so newest appear first in each column.

tasks.title: Add confirmation before delete
tasks.description: When user clicks delete on a card, show modal: 'Are you sure?' with Cancel/Delete.

tasks.title: Accessibility: keyboard focus
tasks.description: Allow tabbing through cards and actions. Ensure focus ring visible.

tasks.title: Fix inconsistent border radius
tasks.description: Task cards use 6px radius but modal uses 10px. Align tokens.

tasks.title: Add responsive breakpoints
tasks.description: On mobile, stack columns vertically with horizontal scroll for each section.

tasks.title: Fix overflow in long descriptions
tasks.description: Long text in description pushes card width. Add line-clamp to 3 lines.

tasks.title: TaskService cleanup
tasks.description: Make taskService use relative URL (/api/tasks) instead of localhost:4000 for deployment.

tasks.title: Add optimistic UI for column drag
tasks.description: When user drags a card to another column, update UI immediately before API resolves.

tasks.title: Add avatar to task card
tasks.description: Support optional 'assignee' with profile initials or image next to title.

tasks.title: Add filter by column in API
tasks.description: Support /api/tasks?column=backlog so frontend can fetch column-specific tasks.

tasks.title: Create README setup steps
tasks.description: Document how to run Next.js app + API routes without json-server.

tasks.title: Deploy to Vercel
tasks.description: Configure project so that /api/tasks works on Vercel without running npm run api.

tasks.title: Bug: modal not closing after save
tasks.description: After editing a task and saving, modal stays open until manual close.

tasks.title: Fix duplicate key warning in React
tasks.description: There's a console warning about duplicate key in task list render.

tasks.title: Column headers sticky
tasks.description: Keep 'Backlog / In Progress / Review / Done' headers visible while scrolling column.

tasks.title: Add timestamps to card UI
tasks.description: Show 'Created 2h ago' under description using createdAt.

tasks.title: Theme tokens / variables
tasks.description: Centralize spacing, border radius, font sizes in one place (tokens.js / css vars).

tasks.title: Unit test for useKanbanBoard
tasks.description: Test drag logic (onDragEnd) and modal logic (openModal/confirmModal).

tasks.title: Bug: search returns all tasks
tasks.description: When calling /api/tasks?q=responsiveness it returns all tasks. Make sure we only match title/description.

tasks.title: Highlight active dragged card
tasks.description: While dragging, reduce opacity of dragged card and add outline.

tasks.title: Add error state UI
tasks.description: If API fails, show <Error /> component with retry button.

tasks.title: Handle slow network gracefully
tasks.description: Show subtle 'Syncing...' badge when mutation is in-flight.

tasks.title: Use Query Keys consistently
tasks.description: Make sure we use taskKeys.lists() / taskKeys.detail(id) everywhere in React Query.

tasks.title: Add hover state to task cards
tasks.description: Slight shadow and scale(1.01) on hover to make cards feel clickable.

tasks.title: Refactor modal to controlled component
tasks.description: TaskModal should receive open/type/task and be fully controlled, no internal state.

tasks.title: Add ability to edit column from modal
tasks.description: Allow changing task.column inside the edit modal (dropdown: Backlog/In Progress/Review/Done).

tasks.title: Add footer credits
tasks.description: Small footer text: 'Kanban demo by [your name]' for portfolio version.

tasks.title: Fix mobile horizontal scroll
tasks.description: On iPhone Safari, columns sometimes overflow screen. Add overflow-x auto on board wrapper.

tasks.title: Add analytics event for create task
tasks.description: Log 'task_created' with column and title length for basic usage insights.

tasks.title: Bug: double submit on Enter key
tasks.description: On task modal, pressing Enter quickly twice creates duplicate tasks.

tasks.title: Keyboard shortcut: N for new task
tasks.description: When user presses 'N', open Add Task modal focused on title input.

tasks.title: Add column counters
tasks.description: Show number of tasks in each column header, e.g. 'Backlog (12)'.

tasks.title: Dark mode theme
tasks.description: Add dark mode styles for board, cards, modal. Detect prefers-color-scheme.
